pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, February 3, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, February 3, 2017:

Québec, Quebec

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the funeral ceremony in honour of the victims of the attack on the Centre culturel islamique de Québec.

Centre des congrès de Québec
900, boul. René-Lévesque Est
Québec, Quebec

Note for Media:

  • Pooled live broadcast only


Neguac, New Brunswick

5:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Neguac Warming Station to meet those who are there and thank volunteers.

Royal Canadian Legion
916 rue Principale
Neguac, New Brunswick

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive for 5:00 p.m.


Lamèque, New Brunswick

7:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Lamèque Military Operations Centre to thank military personnel.

Closed to media

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Lamèque Warming Centre to meet those who are there and thank volunteers.

Notre-Dame-des-Flots Church
72 rue Principale
Lamèque, New Brunswick

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 7:00 p.m.


Note: all times local
